001/**
002 * This controller fetches the employee information from the database
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.data;
006
007import src.database.dbConnect;
008import src.model.employee;
009
010import java.sql.*;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Collections;
013import java.util.List;
014
015public class employeeData {
016    private static final String TABLE = "public.employee";
017
018    /**
019     * This function creates the SQL query to get all the employee data from the database
020     * @return - returns the SQL query
021     */
022    public static List<employee> getAll() {
023        final String sql =
024            "SELECT employeename, position, salary, reporting " + "FROM " + TABLE + " ORDER BY employeename";
025        return query(sql);
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * This function processes the query and converts the information to a list
030     * @param sql - the SQL query
031     * @param params - A string array of the query parameters
032     * @return - returns the list format of the employee information
033     */
034    private static List<employee> query(String sql, String... params) {
035        List<employee> list = new ArrayList<>();
036        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection();
037             PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement(sql)) {
038
039            for (int i = 0; i < params.length; i++) {
040                ps.setString(i + 1, params[i]);
041            }
042
043            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
044                while (rs.next()) {
045                    list.add(fromRow(rs));
046                }
047            }
048        } catch (Exception e) {
049            e.printStackTrace();
050            return Collections.emptyList();
051        }
052        return list;
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * This function creates an employee object for each employee and their respective info found in the list
057     * @param rs - The result from the SQL query
058     * @return - returns the employee object created from the information from the database
059     * @throws SQLException - Throws a SQL exception if the query cannot be processed
060     */
061    private static employee fromRow(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException {
062        String name      = rs.getString("employeename");
063        String position  = rs.getString("position");
064        float  salary    = rs.getFloat("salary");      // use getDouble if you change the model
065        String reporting = rs.getString("reporting");
066        return new employee(name, position, salary, reporting);
067    }
068}
